page.title: 07Sibton Park Cricket Club 2
page.content: At Sibton Park the ground is always kept in good condition and there is a wide variety of mowers and rollers. Quite often I drive the diesel roller and flatten the wicket ready for the next match. There is also a very large mower for cutting the whole pitch fairly quickly. It has a roller with a seat attached to the back so that the mower can go at a speed of about seven miles per hour without the person using it having to run. They have got a mini tractor fitted with grass cutting equipment. The land that Sibton Park Cricket Club used to belong to Mr & Mrs Ridley-Day.
